comments.body: you should probably add a comment for lines 1190 to 1200 (checking x3...x0) that while this is our current expectation, it's not as important as the test for x4. As in, we definitely don't want x4 to regress, because that would mean the hero lept, but it's not as critical that the path be consistent on the way back, so long as it is smooth and pretty.
